original_text: Whom shall he teach knowledge? and whom shall he make to understand doctrine? them that are weaned from the milk, and drawn from the breasts.
korean_text: 그들이 이르기를 그가 누구에게 지식을 가르치며 누구에게 도를 전하여 깨닫게 하려는가 젖 떨어져 품을 떠난 자들에게 하려는가

sentences.original_text: and whom shall he make to understand doctrine?
them that are weaned from the milk,
